data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Al Dhahira, Oman need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Dhahira, Oman
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 118,300 people living in Al Dhahira, Oman. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Al Dhahira, Oman. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 773 believers in Al Dhahira.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Sudanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, please defend the 773 believers in Al Dhahira against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Al Dhahira.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Dhahira, Oman has a population of 118,300.

We estimate Al Dhahira has 773 people who might know Jesus, 2,596 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 114,931 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 114,931 who are far from you in Al Dhahira, Oman from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
